channel.title: Google on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Death of Google Reader - It's offline caching that makes RSS so good for me
item.description: It’s what’s on the inside that counts! For me, what makes RSS a success has been mobile apps with offline caching.

item.title: Google+: still not as interesting as Pinterest <<- why does everyone want it fail?
item.description: Comment - Seems to me that ‘everyone’ wants to find a fault with Google+ and many maybe ‘wishing’ it to fail.

item.title: App Design: Google+ updates app for iOS - result is impressive
item.description: Google+ has updated it’s app for iPhones - Even though the app is not universal - you can see Google+ has high-res / retina display assets and so it renders quite ‘crisp’ even at 2x zoom on the iPad.

item.title: Google+ You can add me to your circles
item.description: Google+ is the new social network which has everybody talking. If you haven’t joined in yet, it’s nothing new.

item.title: [Interactive] Dangermouse wants you to ro.me - another great HTML5 music video
item.description: Music artist and producer Dangermouse has done it again - or that’s to say Google has done it with HTML5.

item.title: Android Market would benefit Developer instead of Apple App Certification?
item.description: Develop apps for Android or develop mobile apps for Apple, some days its hard to figure out just what to do.

item.title: NewsRob best Android application for Google Reader
item.description: Newsrob is my favourite application for Android mobiles, it’s been covered in my 10Best Android Apps** list a few times.

item.title: Mobile SEO - Google extends click to call to mobile search
item.description: In the next couple of weeks, I’ll be looking closely at Mobile Search and Mobile SEO.

item.title: Google Wave will it change SMS Texting and Instant Messaging
item.description: Will Google Wave change SMS texting and instant messaging? Most likely - but that’s about the best answer right now.

item.title: 10 Best Android Apps for your phone
item.description: Here’s a more up to date list featuring some of the best apps you must get on your Android phone.

item.title: 2 Must have Android Apps from Google
item.description: Looking for somewhere to go -. Maybe you need to waste some time or want to find something else to try on your Google Android G1 or HTC Magic.
